meanings.definition: A person or thing that is exceptionally skilled or excellent.

meanings.definition: A type of candy consisting of popcorn and peanuts coated in a sugary glaze.
meanings.sent1: I love snacking on crackajacks while watching movies.

meanings.definition: To crack open or break something with force.
meanings.sent1: He used a hammer to crackajacks the walnut open.
